channel.title: Announcing Rare drops to entire server
channel.description:
Yes, Yes, i know i've seen a few threads, but people don't seem to be giving any information that i don't really have, im curious if anyone may know a snippet or a guide on how to, as i'm still learning to code, i understand most of what i'm suppose to do but still not quite figuring it out.
Thanks for any replies.

item.title: Announcing Rare drops to entire server
item.dc:creator: @tyb97 tyb97
item.description:
@tyb97 wrote:

imstrength:

i support this. i still havent gotten a strait answer that worked -.-

Your definition of answer is equal to leeching. You want somebody to give you the code, you can’t figure it out by yourself.

OT: There is a block in the drop method for rare drops, inside of that block insert a code that iterates over all the players in the server, and then sends a message to all of them, as for what the method says, grab the id of the rare drop id from the collection, then using a method found somewhere in your API, get the name for that item.

Read full topic
item.source: Announcing Rare drops to entire server

item.title: Announcing Rare drops to entire server
item.dc:creator: @Bludstained Bludstained
item.description:
@Bludstained wrote:

I’m not exactly looking for a spoon fed answer, just a simple tutorial or guide even, it doesn’t have to be fully copy and paste i’m just unsure if theres a certain line of code for the drops or not, i know it has something to do with a rare drop ID coming from the npc but that’s about it…

Read full topic
